name: Minelayer
description:
In the future, the dreaded Purple Strikers seek to dominate the Net. It is up to you. A fellow Minelayer to blow their ports and crash their plans.  Defend your base from the Purple Strikers and amass your arsenal of mines to deal the killing blow.

This game  can only be played on Android devices. If there are any problems please tell me. If you want to see more from this game, let me know! Check out my other games too.

Contact Information : yiming.tan2@gmail.com
